text: The National Hockey League (NHL) is a professional sports organization. It contains ice hockey teams in Canada and the United States. It began in 1917 and is still running. == Founding == The National Hockey League began in 1917 in Montreal. It happened because of a series of problems within the Canadian National Hockey Association (NHA). The NHA suspend operations and the new NHL started instead. ==Timeline== Category:Ice hockey in Canada Category:Ice hockey in the United States Category:National Hockey League
title: History of the National Hockey League
